TopicTitle: What are you doing today that you'd rather be playing KSP?

Articles.Content: Simple enough question...as I am having a hard time getting motivated to grade exams from the college courses I teach. My mind keeps thinking that instead of grading papers now, I'll just launch Jeb into space for a couple of orbits, then bring him back home and grade papers later on today. (I know if I did that, I will be sitting here tomorrow morning, wanting to do it all over again! )

Ah yes, exams

Got two quizzes and a practical exam tomorrow, yet I'm here in forums.

Nvm, just taking a break, back to the grind! *poof*
Tests for me. They're online, and none of them seem to be working.

Uhhhhhh...school. I know it's Friday and all but the wait for the weekend is killing me! And it's only 9:23 in the morning! UGH!

I want to mess around with KopernicusTech and make my planet pack support it, since so many people are complaining.

School for me

I wanna go home
Preparing myself for tomorrow biochemistry test

Apparently, I'm old.

I'm working, and would rather be playing KSP.

Though, to be fair, it would be more accurate to say I'm present in the office as opposed to working.
Yep, I've got tests coming out my ears as well. I've set aside this evening to play KSP though, which will be nice!

Nothing, really. Writing an A* pathfinder during project time at work and then later, after my kid goes to bed, I'll either play more Invisible Inc. or continue working on a mission to Jupiter in KSP.

Because all of that is fun.

Doing religion homework. *sigh*

It's not even awesome guys like Odin or Thor... just the usual Jesus stuff.

in science class about to go to english.

yesterday we worked on orbits and how the space shuttle worked and I'm sitting here like. really? really? you trying to teach a person who's logged 1000 hours on kerbal about HOW ORBITS WORK.

I'm at work. Just thinking about launching ships 2 and 3 to Duna tonight.

Wondering which Mun or Minmus contact I should approach while they're in transit.
It's 8:25! Bye guys! Off to school!
I'd so rather be playing ksp than being here:(

I'm giving KSP a break this weekend and spending my free time playing Tales of Xillia instead. It's been sitting in my backlog long enough, I think. Contrary to the thread theme, however, I don't particularly feel like playing KSP until after I'm done, as Tales of Xillia is actually very fun and engaging.
I started work at 3am and finished at 5pm. Too tired to do anything.
Taking care of a sick three-year-old. Fun times.

Work for another 2-3 hours.

Don't tell my boss >.>
Modding ksp :/
Homework:mad:

I don't know, I like it here actually.

And lately I'm a bit short of energy and time, so I cut short my plays at 1h max.

I think I lost the .90 hype boost.
